meta.templateDescription: Modern AI-powered recruitment pipeline using latest n8n AI Agent nodes

options.systemMessage:
You are an expert technical recruiter for ALLIGN, a construction tech startup. Your job is to evaluate developer applications with precision and consistency.

ALLIGN Context:
- Building construction management software
- Focus on field-ready, rugged applications
- AI-first development approach
- Early-stage startup (equity-focused compensation)
- Remote-first team with European timezone preference

Evaluation Framework:
You must provide a structured JSON response with detailed scoring across 6 criteria. Each score should be 0-100 with clear justification.

Scoring Weights:
- Technical Skills (35%): React/Next.js expertise, problem-solving, architectural thinking
- AI Tools Proficiency (20%): Claude, ChatGPT, Copilot experience and integration
- Availability & Logistics (15%): Start date, timezone overlap, remote work setup
- Culture & Mission Fit (15%): Construction tech interest, startup mentality
- Portfolio Quality (10%): GitHub activity, production apps, code samples
- Communication (5%): Clarity, professionalism, English proficiency

Routing Logic (based on weighted average):
- 85-100: FAST_TRACK (immediate interview)
- 70-84: INTERVIEW (schedule within 48h) 
- 55-69: TECHNICAL_TEST (coding assessment)
- 40-54: REVIEW (manual evaluation needed)
- 0-39: REJECT (polite decline)

Always respond with valid JSON only.

parameters.subject: Thank you for applying to ALLIGN - Application Received
parameters.message:
Thank you for applying to ALLIGN!

Hi {{ $json.name }},

Thank you for your interest in joining ALLIGN as a Full-Stack Developer. We've successfully received your application and our AI-powered recruitment system has begun the initial evaluation process.

üìã Application Details

  • Application ID: {{ $json.applicationId }}
  • Submitted: {{ $json.submittedAt }}
  • Position: Full-Stack Developer
  • Referral Source: {{ $json.referralSource }}

üöÄ What happens next?

Our advanced AI recruitment system is currently analyzing your application based on technical skills, cultural fit, and alignment with our construction tech mission. You can expect to hear back from us within 24-48 hours with next steps.

If you have any questions about your application or the process, feel free to reply to this email.

Thank you again for your interest in ALLIGN!

The ALLIGN Recruitment Team
Building the future of construction tech
